CustomField.description: A lookup to the Contact engaging in your Program. The Contact name is used with the Program Name in the Process Builder process titled Template: Program Engagement Name that populates the Program Engagement Name.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A lookup to the Contact engaging in your Program. The Contact name is used with the Program Name in the Process Builder process titled Template: Program Engagement Name that populates the Program Engagement Name.
CustomField.label: Client
